game.name: Succubus Forest
game.shortDescription: A village is invaded by succubi each night. On a quest to defeat them, you enter the Succubus Forest, which is home not only to succubi, but many monster girls that will attack you without mercy. You must fend them off and reach the heart of the forest.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A village is invaded by succubi each night. On a quest to defeat them, you enter the Succubus Forest, which is home not only to succubi, but many monster girls that will attack you without mercy. You must fend them off and reach the heart of the forest.

reviewHighlights.text: [h1]Queen Not Found [/h1] "Succubus Forest" [서큐버스의 숲]은 밤마다 서큐버스에게 습격당하는 마을 사람들을 위해 홀로 숲에 들어가는 주인공의 이야기를 담은 덱 빌딩 로그라이크 도트 게임입니다. [i]서큐버스에게 밤마다 습격당하면 좋은...
